levels.title: Levels
levels.underConstruction: This level is under development, please choose another level

playlists.empty: This playlist is empty, but you can add cards to it. To do this, press and hold on a card for a few seconds to open the playlist menu.
playlists.emptyMistakes: This list is empty and will be populated with words you make mistakes in.
playlists.name: Name
playlists.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this playlist?
playlists.importError: Import failed. Please check the file format.

onboarding.whatToLearn: Which language do you want to learn?
onboarding.explanation: You can change interface and card languages in settings
onboarding.explanationPart1: There you can also toggle pronunciation

settings.privacySubtitle: Manage who can see you and interact with you
settings.showInSearchDesc: Allow other users to find you by email or name
settings.allowFriendRequestsDesc: Allow others to send you friend requests
settings.shareStatsDesc: Allow friends to see your learning progress

about.title: About
about.description: Slovko is the result of existing similar apps having intrusive ads. That's why the idea arose to make our own, completely ad-free. Learn languages by matching word pairs without distractions.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.successMsg: Your feedback helps make Slovko better.

profile.syncWarning: Sign in to save your progress in the cloud and keep it safe across devices.
profile.guestWarning: You are playing as a guest. Sign in to save progress in the cloud and compete with others.
profile.tempAccountWarning: You are using a temporary account. Link an email so you don't lose your progress.
profile.forgotPasswordSubtitle: Enter the email associated with your account
profile.forgotPasswordGoogleInfo: Your account is connected via Google. Since authentication is managed by your Google profile, a separate Slovko password has not been set for this address. Please sign in using Google.
profile.spamWarning: The email may end up in the Spam folder as the app is new.

errors.userNotFound: User with this email not found
errors.accountUsesGoogle: This account uses Google sign-in. Please use the Google button below.
errors.popupClosed: Authorization window was closed. Please try again.
errors.accountExistsEmail: An account with this email already exists. Sign in with Email first, then you can link Google in settings.
errors.googleAlreadyLinked: This Google account is already linked to another Slovko user.
errors.waitingGoogle: Waiting for Google response... If you closed the window, wait a few seconds to unlock.

profile.googlePasswordInfo: You are using Google authorization to sign in. A password for your Slovko account is not set because authentication is managed by your Google profile.
profile.deleteWarning: Warning! This action cannot be undone.
profile.deleteGoogleReauth: You will need to sign in with Google again to confirm

updateNotification.warning: For stable operation, it is recommended to update. This will reset all settings and playlists (as there is no authorization yet). If skipped, errors may occur.

wordReport.title: Report an Error
wordReport.error: Error sending report. Please try again later.
wordReport.authRequired: Please sign in to send feedback.

friends.noFollowing: You are not following anyone yet
friends.noFollowers: You don't have any followers yet

leaderboard.authWarning: Sign in to appear in the leaderboard and compete with others!
